In this custom component you can find the vigilance Bulletin and the Bulletin of national hydrogeological and hydraulic criticalities. Weather forecasts for civil protection purposes differs from the classic "weather forecasts". They highlight potentially harmful situations to people or things. This component was created for personal purposes, in order to be able to monitor the Civil Protection site and check for important updates. I hope it will be useful to you.
